name: Aibot
description: What is the project about? Aibot is a crypto trading bot that runs on Telegram. It allows users to easily execute trades like buying, selling, and copy trading tokens right within Telegram. Aibot focuses on speed and convenience. What makes your project unique? Aibot's uniqueness comes from its speed. It listens to the blockchain mempool in real-time to enable lightning fast trades. This allows it to frontrun and profit from other trades. Aibot also has a multi-node infrastructure for redundancy and geographical optimization. History of your project. Aibot was founded in 2023 with the goal of bringing an ultra-fast trading bot on Telegram. The project has iterated through beta testing and feedback to refine the product. Recently, Aibot launched on Telegram to give public access to its high-speed trading tools. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Upcoming milestones include releasing their own AIBOT token, integrating advanced AI for auto-trading, expanding to other blockchains, and developing an iOS/Android app. The roadmap focuses on more features while improving speed and usability. What can your token be used for? The AIBOT token can be used to get a 50% fee discount on trading fees. Users need to hold 1000 AIBOT to unlock the lower fees. The token also allows holders to claim a portion of fees as rewards. In the future, more utility like governance may be added.
